sentences.en: Bob ate his lunch with evident enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 显然鲍勃吃午饭吃得津津有味。

sentences.en: He signed his name with evident satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 他显然很满意地签了名.

sentences.en: His own distinctiveness was always evident at school.
sentences.cn: 他在学校总是表现得与众不同。

sentences.en: It has now become evident to us that a mistake has been made.
sentences.cn: 我们已经清楚出了差错。

sentences.en: It was evident that she was unhappy.
It was evident that someone had gone through my possessions.
sentences.cn: 显然有人翻过我的物品。

sentences.en: It's evident that he wants to make a cat's paw of you.
Mr Wills unfolds his story with evident enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 威尔斯先生喜形于色地讲述自己的经历。

sentences.en: Nevertheless, in some cases, the demand for a product or process is all too evident.
sentences.cn: 不过，在有些情况下，对某种产品或工艺的需求是极其明显的。

sentences.en: The applause made it evident the play was a hit.
sentences.cn: 掌声显然表明该剧是成功的.

sentences.en: The dangers of such action are self-evident.
sentences.cn: 这样的行动，其危险是明摆着的。

sentences.en: The growing popularity of the subject is evident in the numbers of students wanting to study it.
sentences.cn: 这门课程越来越受欢迎，从想修读此课程的学生人数上即可明显看出这一点。

sentences.en: The implications for this country are self-evident.
sentences.cn: 对该国的影响显而易见。

sentences.en: The privations of monastery life were evident in his appearance.
sentences.cn: 从他的外表来看可以明显看出修道院生活的清贫。

sentences.en: The spokesman made it evident that no compromise was yet in sight.
sentences.cn: 发言人表示,目前还不会妥协.

sentences.en: The threat of inflation is already evident in bond prices.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀的危险在证券价格上已经表现得很明显。

sentences.en: These truths were by no means self - evident when Galileo first suggested them.
sentences.cn: 伽里略首次提出这些真理时决非显而易见.

sentences.en: This point is self - evident and needs no elaboration.

phrases.tran_cn: 不言而喻的；不证自明的

trans.tran_en: easy to see, notice, or understand
